item.title: Pack Flow Control and Shutoff Valves High Flow Mode – Models Without Auxiliary Fuel Tank Provisions

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided two packs are operating.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard the HI FLOW switch "PACK - HIGH FLOW MODE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
